name: Mario vs PS3
description:
Mario finally gathers together enough coin to purchase a Playstation 3, but... what's this? He can't seem to find any games for it. How peculiar. Hey, you! On the other side of the screen! Why don't ya help him out, huh?

  • Multiple levels
  • Multiple bosses
  • Multiple music tracks
  • Multiple buttons to press to do things
  • Multiple keys
  • Multiple endings
  • Multiplier Markiplier voice cameo (legit) (not clickbait) (cops called)
